column5: Hurry guys and gals, get your subscription for Canadian fly fisherman mag,order now and they send you a sweet DVD with 4 shows on it from the New Flyfisher show. and some 9ft 4lbs tippet.  Hurry hurry hurry!! Its only $20 for the year.

F-l-y F-i-s-h-i-n-g????  how do you get hooks that small?  wouldn't you rip the fly's mouth when you set the hook?  Ok all kidding aside folks, I never have tried fly fishing, but always wanted to give it a try.  Maybe this is a good offer to learn about it
